Newbie Guide:
What kind of attack skill are you using right now? My advice is that you choose one skill and focus exclusively on mastering it.
After learning general attack skills, you will learn Relax, which is a recovery skill, and Weapon Mastery or Armor Mastery, which are passive skills. If you want my preference, I think that it is better to learn Weapon Mastery than Armor Mastery. That's just my opinion, mind you.
Once you reach level 10, you can start upgrading your skills to a higher level. It is important that you master the skill that you think is most critical for your success.
If you choose archery, you'll have the opportunity to hunt some very unique creatures, but developing the skill costs both money and MP. To my thinking, it's not really a suitable weapon for us Orcs . . .
